profile.title: Porofaele ya Mošomiši
profile.mustLogin: O swanetše go tsena ka gare go bona dipeakanyo.
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Laetša sa mathomo kgauswi le phetolelo
profile.filterExplicit: Hlaola diteng tša go se swanele bana
profile.allowExplicitContent: Dumelela diteng tša go se swanele bana
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Metsotswana pele e phumolwa ka maitirišo
profile.saveError: Phošo: Ga se gwa kgonega go boloka dipeakanyo
profile.noPrivateKey: Ga go senotlelo sa praebete sediriswing se sa go romelwa.
profile.setBackupPassword: Beakanya phasewete go šireletša bekapo ya gago:
profile.importSuccess: Senotlelo sa praebete se tsentšhitšwe sediriswing se.
profile.importFailed: Go paletšwe go tsenya senotlelo (phasewete e fošagetše goba faele e senyegile).
profile.keysRotated: Senotlelo se seswa se hwetswe gomme sa phatlalatša sa setšhaba.
profile.rotateFailed: Go palelwa ke go fetoša senotlelo.
profile.importKey: Tsenya bekapo ya senotlelo e šireletšwego
profile.keyDisclaimer: Senotlelo sa gago sa praebete ga se tšwe sediriswing se. Romela khopi yeo e šireletšwego ka phasewete gore o ka e bušetša sediriswing se sengwe.
profile.themeFreeNotice: O go Moralo wa Mahala — šomiša dikgetho tša Ka-Masongwana/Ka-Bošego ka mo tlase. Mpshafatša go notlolla ditema tše dintši.
profile.moonTheme: Šomiša tema ya Ngwedi (Mesongwana ya Bofasegodi)
profile.backupTitle: Dibekapo tše Šireletšwego & Go Šetša Didirišwa
profile.backupDesc: Hlamiša dibekapo tša senotlelo ka phasewete, gomme o boele go tšona sediriswing se sengwe go šetša.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Phumola ge app e sa lebelelwe
profile.notifyOnCopy: Ntišetša ge molaetša wa ka o kopišwa
profile.unfollowFailed: Go paletšwe go tlogela go latela
profile.followHint: Dihistori tša bona di tla bonagala go Feedi ya Bao o ba Latelago ge ba romela ka babadi ba Balateli (goba Setšhaba).
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Go na le selo se sa sepeli gabotse karolong ye.
profile.callTextForwardingTitle: Go fetišetša mogala goba/ le melaetša
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Fetišetša megala le melaetša ye e tsenago go mogala goba imeile ye o e netefaditšego. Megala/melaetša ya go tšwa e ka bontšha nomoro ya gago ya Chatforia.
profile.destinationPhoneForCalls: Mogala wa mafelelo (E.164) bakeng sa megala
profile.forwardSaved: Dipeakanyo tša go fetišetša di bolokilwe
profile.errE164: Tsenya mogala wa E.164 wo o nepagetšego (mohl. +15551234567).
profile.errSmsDest: Kgetha bonyenyane lefelo letee (mogala goba imeile).
profile.errQuietHours: Diiri tša khutšo di swanetše go ba magareng ga 0 le 23.

chat.selectPrompt: Kgetha sengwalo goba phaposi ya puisano go thoma go bolela

status.filesNote: Go fihla go difaele tše 5. Ka tlwaelo di fela ka diiri tše 24.

sidebar.errorLoading: Go paletšwe ke go hlahla mešaetša
sidebar.empty: Ga go na dipuisano gona bjale.
sidebar.loginPrompt: Tsena ka gare go lokiša dipeakanyo.

premium.heading: Eya go Premium
premium.description: Notlolla dibopego tša maatla & tloša dikgwebo.

auth.headline: Melaetša ya tšhireletšo ya lefase ka phetolelo ya potlako
auth.description: Go šireletšwa go ya mafelelong (E2E), phetolelo ye e godišitšwego ke AI, melaetša ya go nyamela, le megala ya lentšu/vidio.

feature.encryption: Go šireletšwa go ya mafelelong ka tlwaelo
feature.disappearing: Melaetša ya go nyamela & ditiišetšo tša go bala
feature.privacy: Sephiri pele. Datha ya gago, taolo ya gago.

auth.desktopTip: O lego khomphuthareng? Skene ka founo ya gago go laolla app.
auth.subhead: Melaetša ya praebete, e šireleditšwego, le e fetoletšwego — ka pela.
auth.tip: O ka šomiša Chatforia sedirisweng se sengwe le se sengwe — goba laolla app bakeng sa maitemogelo a kaone.
auth.scanHint: Skene go laolla app goba bula ka praosara ya gago.

footer.doNotSell: O seke wa re rekišetša Tshedimošo ya ka

press.title: Baphatlalatši
press.contact: Bakeng sa dipotšišo tša baphatlalatši, re ngwaleleng go press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Bakeng sa dipotšišo tša baphatlalatši, re ngwaleleng go press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia ke molaetšagotee wa tšhireletšego ka phetolelo ya potlako le E2E, o agilwego go dira gore dipoledišano tša lefase e be tša praebete ebile di se bonolo.
press.assetsText: Dilogoo, dikopanetswe, le diswantšho tša sehlahiswa (go tla ka moso).

careers.title: Mešomo
careers.intro: Re sehlopha se senyenyane se aga molaetšagotee wa praebete le wa lefase. Ge o hlokomela tšhireletšo, go fihlelela, le UX ya go kgahliša, re ka rata go kwa ka wena.
careers.openRoles: Mešomo yeo e bulegilego: Boengineere (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Sehlahli, Thekgo.
careers.apply: Kamoo o ka dirišetšago: Romela CV/dihlopha go jobs@chatforia.com.
careers.emailCta: Romela CV ya gago ka imeile

about.title: Ka ga Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia ke molaetšagotee wa maleme a mantši, o šireleditšwego ka pheletšo go ya pheletšong, ka phetolelo ya nakwana le megala ya lentšu/vidio. Maikemišetšo a rena ke a bonolo: go thuša batho go ikgokaganya — ka tshireletšo, praebete, le ka gare ga maleme.

values.access: Tsenopele go bohle: Phetolelo ya maitirišo ya maleme a 100+.
values.control: Taolo: Melaetša ya go nyamela & ditiišetšo tša go bala ke boikgethelo.

about.howDescription: Melaetša e šireletšwa sediriswing sa gago pele e tšwa. Phetolelo, dibekapo, le go šetša didirišwa di agilwe go fokotša seo di-server di ka se bonago.

advertise.title: Ipapatše ka Chatforia
advertise.description: Fihlelela basebedi ba melaetša ka diphuthego tše botse le tše sireletšegilego. Re fana ka diphousetara tša go bonagala gabotse, botswadišo, le dipapatšo tša ka gare ga ntlo. Ba Premium ga ba bone dipapatšo.

adsense.withPubId: Gona bjale re fa dipapatšo ka Google AdSense. Ge o nyaka go re lebanya ka Google Ads, šomiša ID ya mophatlalatši {{pubId}} gomme o kgopele maemedi a laološitšwego mo diyuniti tša rena ka tlase. Ditumellano tša go lebanya di gona—šomiša foromo.
adsense.noPubId: Gona bjale re fa dipapatšo ka Google AdSense. Ditumellano tša go lebanya gape di gona—šomiša foromo mo tlase.

advertise.noPlacements: Ga go na maemedi a beakantšwego gabjale. Aketša ona go ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Mafelelo a makgolo a dikgaošo le nako ya go dula ka UI ya puisano
why.brandSafe: Diformete tša go šireletša brand; go laola bontši bja ponagalo
why.sponsoredMoments: Dikgopolo tše thekgilwego (mohl. “Thoma Puisano”) di gona
why.deals: Ditumellano tša go lebanya goba ka AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Re leboga! Potšišo ya gago e tswile. Re tla araba kgauswi.
form.missingRequired: Hle tlatša leina, imeile, le molaetša.
form.successToast: Re a leboga! Re tla kgokaganya kgauswi.
form.mailtoInfo: Re bula sešomi sa imeile go romela potšišo…
form.messagePlaceholder: Go lebanya, matšatši, KPI, dikgetho tša maemedi…

legal.disclaimerStart: Ka go romela, o dumelelana le

upgrade.title: Mpshafatšo
upgrade.subtitle: Kgetha morero wo o go swanetšego: tloša dipapatšo ka Plus, goba hwetša dibopego ka moka ka Premium.

scheduleBanner.title: Pehelo e tla fela
scheduleBanner.body: O tla boela go Mahala ka

features.plusAll: Tšohle tše di lego go Plus
features.ringtones: Diringitone & medumo ya melaetša ya go itlhophela

gettingStarted.title: Go Thoma
gettingStarted.subtitle: O moswa go Chatforia? Tše di latelago di go bontšha tše bohlokwa gore o be le thušo ka metsotso.

alert.text: Tataiso ye e tla gola ge re tsebagatša dibopego tše mpsha. Ge go na le se se lego se se lahlegilego, re tsebiše ka

section2.title: 2) Thoma go romelana melaetša
section2.item1: Hlama DM goba Sehlopha gomme o romele molaetša wa pele.
section2.item2: Šomiša phetolelo ya nakwana go bolela maleme a 100+.
section2.item3: Lekola melaetša ya go nyamela le ditiišetšo tša go bala go Porofaele → Sephiri.

section3.title: 3) Eya pele
section3.item1Part2: (Plus = ga go dipapatšo, Premium = dibopego ka moka).
section3.item2Part1: Kgokaganya didirišwa tše dingwe gomme o beakanye dibekapo tše šireletšwego go

account.q: Ke hlama bjang goba go bušetša akhaonto ya ka?
account.a: Laolla app goba šomiša wepe, kgotla “Hlama akhaonto”, netefatša imeile/mogala. Go bušetša, šomiša “O lebetše phasewete”.

privacy.q: Na melaetša e šireletšwe go ya mafelelong?
privacy.a: Ee. Melaetša le megala di šireleditšwe ka E2E ka tlwaelo. Ke wena le moamogedi fela ba ka e balago.

translate.q: Phetolelo ya nakwana e šoma bjang?
translate.a: Bulela “Fetolela ka maitirišo” go Dipeakanyo → Ponagalo & Polelo. Re fetoletša sediriswing ge go kgonega, goba ka di-API tše šireletšwego ka tshedimošo e nnyane.

contact.a: Re ngwaleleng go support@chatforia.com. Akaretša disekirinišothe le kgatišo ya app.

contact.title: Ikgokaganye le rena
contact.successMsg: Re a leboga — sehlopha sa rena se tla araba ka imeile.
contact.errorSend: Ga se gwa kgonega go romela. Hle ngwalela support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Pholisi ye ya Sephiri e hlalosa kamoo Chatforia (“re”, “rena”) e bokelago, e šomišago, le go abelana tshedimošo ge o šomiša di-app le ditirelo tša rena. Re aga Chatforia go fokotša datha yeo re ka e bonago.

infoWeCollect.title: Tshedimošo ye re e bokelago
infoWeCollect.account: Tshedimošo ya akhaonto (mohl., imeile/mogala) go hlama le go šireletša akhaonto.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Dikagare tše šireletšwego (melaetša/megala) di E2E; ga re kgone go di bala.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Diphošo/šomišo tše bjalo ka dipuku tša go thulana, mohuta wa sediriswa, goba di-analytics tše nnyane go kaonafatša tshepetšo.

howWeUse.title: Kamoo re šomišago tshedimošo
howWeUse.provide: Go fana le go šireletša tirelo (tsenogare, go lemoga spam/pefo).
howWeUse.improve: Go kaonafatša dibopego (boleng bja phetolelo, tshepetšo).

sharing.title: Go abelana
sharing.body: Ga re reki datha ya praebete. Re ka abelana datha e nyenyane le balemi ba ditirelo (mohl., di-push, di-analytics) ka ditumellano tše thata.

rights.title: Ditokelo tša gago
rights.body: Go ya ka tikologo ya gago (mohl., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), o ka kgopela go bona, go lokiša, go phumola, goba go gana diprosese tše dingwe. Ikgokaganye: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Poloko ya datha & tšhireletšo
retention.body: Re boloka fela tše di hlokegago go šomiša tirelo gomme re šomiša tšhireletšo ya maemo a tša intasteri. Dikagare tša E2E ga re kgone go di šutholla.

children.title: Bana
children.body: Chatforia ga e lebelele bana ba ka tlase ga 13 (goba go ya ka molao wa geno).

changes.title: Diphetogo
changes.body: Re tla bea dintšhitšo mo gomme ra mpshafatša letšatšikgwedi la “E ntšhitšwe”.

intro.body: Ka go šomiša Chatforia o dumelelana le Melao ye. Ge o sa dumele, o seke wa šomiša tirelo.

accounts.title: Diakhaonto
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Nea tshedimošo ye e nepagetšego gomme o boloke dikhredišenthe di šireletšegile.
accounts.itemResponsibility: O ikarabela ka mošomo ka akhaonto ya gago.

acceptableUse.title: Tšhomišo e amogelegago
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Ga go diteng tša molao o kgahlanong, pefo, goba ya go roba ditokelo; ga go spam goba go šomiša disebediswa ka maitirelo a sa lokago.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Re ka emisa/fehla ge go na le go roba melao.

yourContent.title: Dikagare tša gago
yourContent.body: O boloka ditokelo tša dikagare tša gago. O re nea ditokelo tše di hlokegago go šomiša tirelo (mohl., go tsamaisa, polokelo, phetolelo).

disclaimer.title: Boitshwaro & maikarabelo
disclaimer.body: Tirelo e fiwa “ka ge e le” ntle le ditiro tša tiišetšo. Go ya ka molao, Chatforia ga e ikarabelle ka tšenyo ya go se lebale goba ya go latela.

changes.title: Diphetogo
changes.body: Re ka mpshafatša melao; go tšwela pele go šomiša ka morago ga diphetogo go ra gore o a dumela.

doNotSell.title: O seke wa Re Rekisetsa Tshedimošo ya ka
doNotSell.body: Chatforia ga e reki tshedimošo ya praebete. Baagi ba California ba ka dutše ba romela dikopelo ka tlasa CPRA ka konope ka tlase.

cookies.title: Dipeakanyo tsa Dikuk'i
cookies.body: Chatforia e šomiša dikuk'i tše di fokolago (mohl., setšhono, tšhireletšo). Ga re šomiše dikuk'i tša dipapatšo tša batho ba boraro. Laola dikuk'i ka dipeakanyo tša praosara.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: Ga go kgonege go hlahla boemo bja nomoro ya mogala.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Ga go na nomoro ye e abetšwego. Kgetha ka koutu ya sebaka go thoma go romela melaetša.

startChatModal.title: Thoma puisano
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Ngwala leina, leina la mošomiši, mogala, goba imeile…
startChatModal.startWithSelected: Thoma puisano le bao o ba kgethilego
startChatModal.searchByUsernameOrPhone: Phuruphutša ka leina la mošomiši goba mogala
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Ngwala leina la mošomiši goba mogala gomme o kgotle Phuruphutša.
startChatModal.pickFromContacts: Goba kgetha go tšwa go dikokantšho
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Dintlha tša mogala/imeile di tla hwetšagala ka morago ga ge o di boloka bjalo ka dikokantšho.
startChatModal.failedBulkStart: Go paletšwe go thoma puisano le bao o ba kgethilego.

sounds.freeNotice: O go Mahala — medumo ya premium e bontšhwa eupša e notletšwe. Mpshafatša go notlolla tšohle.

premiumGuard.requiresPremium: Sebopegotee se se nyaka morero wa Premium.

aiSettings.title: Dipeakanyo tša AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Laola phetolelo, dikarabo tše bohlale, le dikarabo tša maitirišo tša ForiaBot.
aiSettings.autoTranslateIncoming: Fetolela melaetša ye e tsenago ka maitirišo
aiSettings.showOriginalAlongside: Laetša sengwalo sa mathomo kgauswi le phetolelo
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Romela melaetša e mmalwa ya go hwetšwa (e hloekisitšwe) go AI go šišinya dikarabo ka pela.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Pata mantšu a go se lokafatšwe go dikarabo tša AI
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Ge go buletšwe, dikarabo tše tsošitšwego ke AI di tla ba le mantšu a go phošolla a patilwego
aiSettings.enableAutoReply: Bula karabo ya maitirišo ge ke šoma
aiSettings.saveFailed: Go paletšwe go boloka dipeakanyo tša AI
aiSettings.translateTagged: Ge go na le @translated goba go tagiwa fela
aiSettings.translateAll: Fetolela melaetša ka moka ye e tsenago
aiSettings.modeAll: Melaetša ka moka ye e tsenago

accessibilitySettings.title: Go Fihlelela & Ditemošo
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Dikgetho tša go dira gore Chatforia e be bonolo go šomišwa le ge o sa ithekge medumo.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: E thoma ka bogolo bja tlwaelo. Oketša ge o rata mongwalo o mogolo go dipeakanyo tša go fihlelela.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Ditemošo tša pono bakeng sa melaetša & megala
Bontšha dibenara le go phadimetša thaetlele gore o se ke wa lahlegelwa ke tiro.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Dirila ge go na le melaetša e meswa (ge go thekgwa)
Tutueletša sediriswa ge go na le ditemošo.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Phadimetša sekirini ge go lla mogala
Phadimetšo e khanyang ge mogala o lla.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Fetoletša ka maitirišo dintšu tša lentšu
Kgomaretša phetolelo go melaetša ya audio ye o e hwetsago.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlerts: Ditemošo tša pono bakeng sa melaetša & megala
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Bontšha dibenara le go phadimetša thaetlele gore o se ke wa lahlegelwa ke tiro.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Dirila ge go na le melaetša e meswa (ge go thekgwa)
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewDesc: Tutueletša sediriswa ge go na le ditemošo.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallShort: Phadimetša sekirini ge go na le mogala o tsenago
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Phadimetšo e khanyang ge mogala o lla.

privacySection.strictE2EE: Tšhireletšo ya pheletšo go ya pheletšong (E2E) ka go tia
privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Boloka feela sengwalo sa go šireletšwa go server. E nemsa AI/Phetolelo le diponelopele tša taolo.

linkedDevicesPanel.title: Didirišwa tše di Kgokaganywago
linkedDevicesPanel.noneFound: Ga go hwetšwe didirišwa tše di kgokaganywago.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Nyaka ka leina la go dirišwa, leina, leina la mošomiši, goba mogala
peoplePage.quickStartDesc: Ditsela tše mmalwa tša ka pela go thoma.
peoplePage.searchByPhoneOrUsername: Nyaka ka mogala / leina la mošomiši
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Abelana sehokelo sa go laletša go thoma puisano kapejana.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Dula o gogetšwe le Chatforia ya iOS le Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Keletšo: Melaetša ya gago e dula e šetšwe gare ga wepe le mo founong.

randomChat.title: Puisano ya ka tšhoganetšo
randomChat.description: Khwela motho yo moswa ka pela. Re tla go bapetša gomme re bule phaposi ya nakwana.
randomChat.noPartner: Ga go hwetšwe molekane gona bjale.
randomChat.saveGuard: Ke dipuisano tša motho-go-motho fela tšeo di ka bolokwago
